problem.name: array-callback-return
problem.description: Enforce `return` statements in callbacks of array methods

problem.name: constructor-super
problem.description: Require `super()` calls in constructors

problem.name: for-direction
problem.description: Enforce "for" loop update clause moving the counter in the right direction

problem.name: getter-return
problem.description: Enforce `return` statements in getters

problem.name: no-async-promise-executor
problem.description: Disallow using an async function as a Promise executor

problem.name: no-await-in-loop
problem.description: Disallow `await` inside of loops

problem.name: no-class-assign
problem.description: Disallow reassigning class members

problem.name: no-compare-neg-zero
problem.description: Disallow comparing against -0

problem.name: no-cond-assign
problem.description: Disallow assignment operators in conditional expressions

problem.name: no-const-assign
problem.description: Disallow reassigning `const` variables

problem.name: no-constant-binary-expression
problem.description: Disallow expressions where the operation doesn't affect the value

problem.name: no-constant-condition
problem.description: Disallow constant expressions in conditions

problem.name: no-constructor-return
problem.description: Disallow returning value from constructor

problem.name: no-control-regex
problem.description: Disallow control characters in regular expressions

problem.name: no-debugger
problem.description: Disallow the use of `debugger`

problem.name: no-dupe-args
problem.description: Disallow duplicate arguments in `function` definitions

problem.name: no-dupe-class-members
problem.description: Disallow duplicate class members

problem.name: no-dupe-else-if
problem.description: Disallow duplicate conditions in if-else-if chains

problem.name: no-dupe-keys
problem.description: Disallow duplicate keys in object literals

problem.name: no-duplicate-case
problem.description: Disallow duplicate case labels

problem.name: no-duplicate-imports
problem.description: Disallow duplicate module imports

problem.name: no-empty-character-class
problem.description: Disallow empty character classes in regular expressions

problem.name: no-empty-pattern
problem.description: Disallow empty destructuring patterns

problem.name: no-ex-assign
problem.description: Disallow reassigning exceptions in `catch` clauses

problem.name: no-fallthrough
problem.description: Disallow fallthrough of `case` statements

problem.name: no-func-assign
problem.description: Disallow reassigning `function` declarations

problem.name: no-import-assign
problem.description: Disallow assigning to imported bindings

problem.name: no-inner-declarations
problem.description: Disallow variable or `function` declarations in nested blocks

problem.name: no-invalid-regexp
problem.description: Disallow invalid regular expression strings in `RegExp` constructors

problem.name: no-irregular-whitespace
problem.description: Disallow irregular whitespace

problem.name: no-loss-of-precision
problem.description: Disallow literal numbers that lose precision

problem.name: no-misleading-character-class
problem.description: Disallow characters which are made with multiple code points in character class syntax

problem.name: no-new-native-nonconstructor
problem.description: Disallow `new` operators with global non-constructor functions

problem.name: no-new-symbol
problem.description: Disallow `new` operators with the `Symbol` object

problem.name: no-obj-calls
problem.description: Disallow calling global object properties as functions

problem.name: no-promise-executor-return
problem.description: Disallow returning values from Promise executor functions

problem.name: no-prototype-builtins
problem.description: Disallow calling some `Object.prototype` methods directly on objects

problem.name: no-self-assign
problem.description: Disallow assignments where both sides are exactly the same

problem.name: no-self-compare
problem.description: Disallow comparisons where both sides are exactly the same

problem.name: no-setter-return
problem.description: Disallow returning values from setters

problem.name: no-sparse-arrays
problem.description: Disallow sparse arrays

problem.name: no-template-curly-in-string
problem.description: Disallow template literal placeholder syntax in regular strings

problem.name: no-this-before-super
problem.description: Disallow `this`/`super` before calling `super()` in constructors

problem.name: no-undef
problem.description: Disallow the use of undeclared variables unless mentioned in `/*global */` comments

problem.name: no-unexpected-multiline
problem.description: Disallow confusing multiline expressions

problem.name: no-unmodified-loop-condition
problem.description: Disallow unmodified loop conditions

problem.name: no-unreachable
problem.description: Disallow unreachable code after `return`, `throw`, `continue`, and `break` statements

problem.name: no-unreachable-loop
problem.description: Disallow loops with a body that allows only one iteration

problem.name: no-unsafe-finally
problem.description: Disallow control flow statements in `finally` blocks

problem.name: no-unsafe-negation
problem.description: Disallow negating the left operand of relational operators

problem.name: no-unsafe-optional-chaining
problem.description: Disallow use of optional chaining in contexts where the `undefined` value is not allowed

problem.name: no-unused-private-class-members
problem.description: Disallow unused private class members

problem.name: no-unused-vars
problem.description: Disallow unused variables

problem.name: no-use-before-define
problem.description: Disallow the use of variables before they are defined

problem.name: no-useless-backreference
problem.description: Disallow useless backreferences in regular expressions

problem.name: require-atomic-updates
problem.description: Disallow assignments that can lead to race conditions due to usage of `await` or `yield`

problem.name: use-isnan
problem.description: Require calls to `isNaN()` when checking for `NaN`

problem.name: valid-typeof
problem.description: Enforce comparing `typeof` expressions against valid strings

suggestion.name: accessor-pairs
suggestion.description: Enforce getter and setter pairs in objects and classes

suggestion.name: arrow-body-style
suggestion.description: Require braces around arrow function bodies

suggestion.name: block-scoped-var
suggestion.description: Enforce the use of variables within the scope they are defined

suggestion.name: camelcase
suggestion.description: Enforce camelcase naming convention

suggestion.name: capitalized-comments
suggestion.description: Enforce or disallow capitalization of the first letter of a comment

suggestion.name: class-methods-use-this
suggestion.description: Enforce that class methods utilize `this`

suggestion.name: complexity
suggestion.description: Enforce a maximum cyclomatic complexity allowed in a program

suggestion.name: consistent-return
suggestion.description: Require `return` statements to either always or never specify values

suggestion.name: consistent-this
suggestion.description: Enforce consistent naming when capturing the current execution context

suggestion.name: curly
suggestion.description: Enforce consistent brace style for all control statements

suggestion.name: default-case
suggestion.description: Require `default` cases in `switch` statements

suggestion.name: default-case-last
suggestion.description: Enforce default clauses in switch statements to be last

suggestion.name: default-param-last
suggestion.description: Enforce default parameters to be last

suggestion.name: dot-notation
suggestion.description: Enforce dot notation whenever possible

suggestion.name: eqeqeq
suggestion.description: Require the use of `===` and `!==`

suggestion.name: func-name-matching
suggestion.description: Require function names to match the name of the variable or property to which they are assigned

suggestion.name: func-names
suggestion.description: Require or disallow named `function` expressions

suggestion.name: func-style
suggestion.description: Enforce the consistent use of either `function` declarations or expressions

suggestion.name: grouped-accessor-pairs
suggestion.description: Require grouped accessor pairs in object literals and classes

suggestion.name: guard-for-in
suggestion.description: Require `for-in` loops to include an `if` statement

suggestion.name: id-denylist
suggestion.description: Disallow specified identifiers

suggestion.name: id-length
suggestion.description: Enforce minimum and maximum identifier lengths

suggestion.name: id-match
suggestion.description: Require identifiers to match a specified regular expression

suggestion.name: init-declarations
suggestion.description: Require or disallow initialization in variable declarations

suggestion.name: logical-assignment-operators
suggestion.description: Require or disallow logical assignment operator shorthand

suggestion.name: max-classes-per-file
suggestion.description: Enforce a maximum number of classes per file

suggestion.name: max-depth
suggestion.description: Enforce a maximum depth that blocks can be nested

suggestion.name: max-lines
suggestion.description: Enforce a maximum number of lines per file

suggestion.name: max-lines-per-function
suggestion.description: Enforce a maximum number of lines of code in a function

suggestion.name: max-nested-callbacks
suggestion.description: Enforce a maximum depth that callbacks can be nested

suggestion.name: max-params
suggestion.description: Enforce a maximum number of parameters in function definitions

suggestion.name: max-statements
suggestion.description: Enforce a maximum number of statements allowed in function blocks

suggestion.name: multiline-comment-style
suggestion.description: Enforce a particular style for multiline comments

suggestion.name: new-cap
suggestion.description: Require constructor names to begin with a capital letter

suggestion.name: no-alert
suggestion.description: Disallow the use of `alert`, `confirm`, and `prompt`

suggestion.name: no-array-constructor
suggestion.description: Disallow `Array` constructors

suggestion.name: no-bitwise
suggestion.description: Disallow bitwise operators

suggestion.name: no-caller
suggestion.description: Disallow the use of `arguments.caller` or `arguments.callee`

suggestion.name: no-case-declarations
suggestion.description: Disallow lexical declarations in case clauses

suggestion.name: no-console
suggestion.description: Disallow the use of `console`

suggestion.name: no-continue
suggestion.description: Disallow `continue` statements

suggestion.name: no-delete-var
suggestion.description: Disallow deleting variables

suggestion.name: no-div-regex
suggestion.description: Disallow equal signs explicitly at the beginning of regular expressions

suggestion.name: no-else-return
suggestion.description: Disallow `else` blocks after `return` statements in `if` statements

suggestion.name: no-empty
suggestion.description: Disallow empty block statements

suggestion.name: no-empty-function
suggestion.description: Disallow empty functions

suggestion.name: no-empty-static-block
suggestion.description: Disallow empty static blocks

suggestion.name: no-eq-null
suggestion.description: Disallow `null` comparisons without type-checking operators

suggestion.name: no-eval
suggestion.description: Disallow the use of `eval()`

suggestion.name: no-extend-native
suggestion.description: Disallow extending native types

suggestion.name: no-extra-bind
suggestion.description: Disallow unnecessary calls to `.bind()`

suggestion.name: no-extra-boolean-cast
suggestion.description: Disallow unnecessary boolean casts

suggestion.name: no-extra-label
suggestion.description: Disallow unnecessary labels

suggestion.name: no-global-assign
suggestion.description: Disallow assignments to native objects or read-only global variables

suggestion.name: no-implicit-coercion
suggestion.description: Disallow shorthand type conversions

suggestion.name: no-implicit-globals
suggestion.description: Disallow declarations in the global scope

suggestion.name: no-implied-eval
suggestion.description: Disallow the use of `eval()`-like methods

suggestion.name: no-inline-comments
suggestion.description: Disallow inline comments after code

suggestion.name: no-invalid-this
suggestion.description: Disallow use of `this` in contexts where the value of `this` is `undefined`

suggestion.name: no-iterator
suggestion.description: Disallow the use of the `__iterator__` property

suggestion.name: no-label-var
suggestion.description: Disallow labels that share a name with a variable

suggestion.name: no-labels
suggestion.description: Disallow labeled statements

suggestion.name: no-lone-blocks
suggestion.description: Disallow unnecessary nested blocks

suggestion.name: no-lonely-if
suggestion.description: Disallow `if` statements as the only statement in `else` blocks

suggestion.name: no-loop-func
suggestion.description: Disallow function declarations that contain unsafe references inside loop statements

suggestion.name: no-magic-numbers
suggestion.description: Disallow magic numbers

suggestion.name: no-multi-assign
suggestion.description: Disallow use of chained assignment expressions

suggestion.name: no-multi-str
suggestion.description: Disallow multiline strings

suggestion.name: no-negated-condition
suggestion.description: Disallow negated conditions

suggestion.name: no-nested-ternary
suggestion.description: Disallow nested ternary expressions

suggestion.name: no-new
suggestion.description: Disallow `new` operators outside of assignments or comparisons

suggestion.name: no-new-func
suggestion.description: Disallow `new` operators with the `Function` object

suggestion.name: no-new-wrappers
suggestion.description: Disallow `new` operators with the `String`, `Number`, and `Boolean` objects

suggestion.name: no-nonoctal-decimal-escape
suggestion.description: Disallow `\8` and `\9` escape sequences in string literals

suggestion.name: no-object-constructor
suggestion.description: Disallow calls to the `Object` constructor without an argument

suggestion.name: no-octal
suggestion.description: Disallow octal literals

suggestion.name: no-octal-escape
suggestion.description: Disallow octal escape sequences in string literals

suggestion.name: no-param-reassign
suggestion.description: Disallow reassigning `function` parameters

suggestion.name: no-plusplus
suggestion.description: Disallow the unary operators `++` and `--`

suggestion.name: no-proto
suggestion.description: Disallow the use of the `__proto__` property

suggestion.name: no-redeclare
suggestion.description: Disallow variable redeclaration

suggestion.name: no-regex-spaces
suggestion.description: Disallow multiple spaces in regular expressions

suggestion.name: no-restricted-exports
suggestion.description: Disallow specified names in exports

suggestion.name: no-restricted-globals
suggestion.description: Disallow specified global variables

suggestion.name: no-restricted-imports
suggestion.description: Disallow specified modules when loaded by `import`

suggestion.name: no-restricted-properties
suggestion.description: Disallow certain properties on certain objects

suggestion.name: no-restricted-syntax
suggestion.description: Disallow specified syntax

suggestion.name: no-return-assign
suggestion.description: Disallow assignment operators in `return` statements

suggestion.name: no-script-url
suggestion.description: Disallow `javascript:` urls

suggestion.name: no-sequences
suggestion.description: Disallow comma operators

suggestion.name: no-shadow
suggestion.description: Disallow variable declarations from shadowing variables declared in the outer scope

suggestion.name: no-shadow-restricted-names
suggestion.description: Disallow identifiers from shadowing restricted names

suggestion.name: no-ternary
suggestion.description: Disallow ternary operators

suggestion.name: no-throw-literal
suggestion.description: Disallow throwing literals as exceptions

suggestion.name: no-undef-init
suggestion.description: Disallow initializing variables to `undefined`

suggestion.name: no-undefined
suggestion.description: Disallow the use of `undefined` as an identifier

suggestion.name: no-underscore-dangle
suggestion.description: Disallow dangling underscores in identifiers

suggestion.name: no-unneeded-ternary
suggestion.description: Disallow ternary operators when simpler alternatives exist

suggestion.name: no-unused-expressions
suggestion.description: Disallow unused expressions

suggestion.name: no-unused-labels
suggestion.description: Disallow unused labels

suggestion.name: no-useless-call
suggestion.description: Disallow unnecessary calls to `.call()` and `.apply()`

suggestion.name: no-useless-catch
suggestion.description: Disallow unnecessary `catch` clauses

suggestion.name: no-useless-computed-key
suggestion.description: Disallow unnecessary computed property keys in objects and classes

suggestion.name: no-useless-concat
suggestion.description: Disallow unnecessary concatenation of literals or template literals

suggestion.name: no-useless-constructor
suggestion.description: Disallow unnecessary constructors

suggestion.name: no-useless-escape
suggestion.description: Disallow unnecessary escape characters

suggestion.name: no-useless-rename
suggestion.description: Disallow renaming import, export, and destructured assignments to the same name

suggestion.name: no-useless-return
suggestion.description: Disallow redundant return statements

suggestion.name: no-var
suggestion.description: Require `let` or `const` instead of `var`

suggestion.name: no-void
suggestion.description: Disallow `void` operators

suggestion.name: no-warning-comments
suggestion.description: Disallow specified warning terms in comments

suggestion.name: no-with
suggestion.description: Disallow `with` statements

suggestion.name: object-shorthand
suggestion.description: Require or disallow method and property shorthand syntax for object literals

suggestion.name: one-var
suggestion.description: Enforce variables to be declared either together or separately in functions

suggestion.name: operator-assignment
suggestion.description: Require or disallow assignment operator shorthand where possible

suggestion.name: prefer-arrow-callback
suggestion.description: Require using arrow functions for callbacks

suggestion.name: prefer-const
suggestion.description: Require `const` declarations for variables that are never reassigned after declared

suggestion.name: prefer-destructuring
suggestion.description: Require destructuring from arrays and/or objects

suggestion.name: prefer-exponentiation-operator
suggestion.description: Disallow the use of `Math.pow` in favor of the `**` operator

suggestion.name: prefer-named-capture-group
suggestion.description: Enforce using named capture group in regular expression

suggestion.name: prefer-numeric-literals
suggestion.description: Disallow `parseInt()` and `Number.parseInt()` in favor of binary, octal, and hexadecimal literals

suggestion.name: prefer-object-has-own
suggestion.description: Disallow use of `Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call()` and prefer use of `Object.hasOwn()`

suggestion.name: prefer-object-spread
suggestion.description: Disallow using Object.assign with an object literal as the first argument and prefer the use of object spread instead

suggestion.name: prefer-promise-reject-errors
suggestion.description: Require using Error objects as Promise rejection reasons

suggestion.name: prefer-regex-literals
suggestion.description: Disallow use of the `RegExp` constructor in favor of regular expression literals

suggestion.name: prefer-rest-params
suggestion.description: Require rest parameters instead of `arguments`

suggestion.name: prefer-spread
suggestion.description: Require spread operators instead of `.apply()`

suggestion.name: prefer-template
suggestion.description: Require template literals instead of string concatenation

suggestion.name: radix
suggestion.description: Enforce the consistent use of the radix argument when using `parseInt()`

suggestion.name: require-await
suggestion.description: Disallow async functions which have no `await` expression

suggestion.name: require-unicode-regexp
suggestion.description: Enforce the use of `u` or `v` flag on RegExp

suggestion.name: require-yield
suggestion.description: Require generator functions to contain `yield`

suggestion.name: sort-imports
suggestion.description: Enforce sorted import declarations within modules

suggestion.name: sort-keys
suggestion.description: Require object keys to be sorted

suggestion.name: sort-vars
suggestion.description: Require variables within the same declaration block to be sorted

suggestion.name: strict
suggestion.description: Require or disallow strict mode directives

suggestion.name: symbol-description
suggestion.description: Require symbol descriptions

suggestion.name: vars-on-top
suggestion.description: Require `var` declarations be placed at the top of their containing scope

suggestion.name: yoda
suggestion.description: Require or disallow "Yoda" conditions

layout.name: unicode-bom
layout.description: Require or disallow Unicode byte order mark (BOM)
